using namespace std;
#define gc getchar_unlocked
#define pn() printf("\n")
void scanint(long long &x)
{
register long long c = gc();
x = 0;
long long neg = 0;
for(;((c<48 || c>57) && c != '-');c = gc());
if(c=='-') {neg=1;c=gc();}
for(;c>47 && c<58;c = gc()) {x = (x<<1) + (x<<3) + c - 48;}
if(neg) x=-x;
}
#define pc putchar_unlocked
void printlong(long long n)
{
char op[41];
int size = 40;
while(n)
{
op[size--] = n%10+'0';
n/=10;
}
for(int i=size+1;i<41;i++)
pc(op[i]);
pc('\n');
}
int main(){
    int t;
    scanf("%d",&t);
    long long n,k,m;
//    vector<int> ans;
    for(int i = 0;i<t;i++){
    scanint(n);
    scanint(k);
    scanint(m);
    if(k ==1)
    printlong(n);
    else
    {
    while((n%k == 0) && m){
              n = n/k;
              m--;}
    m = m%2;
    if(m == 1)
         printlong(n*k);
    else 
         printlong(n);
    }
}
